name: Surtr: The Edge Of Ragnarok
description:
Driven by the promise of learning his mother's identity, Modi the son of Thor, sets off to muspelheim to combat Surtr.

With Freya's promise of rebirth, he will undoubtedly die many times working towards his goal. But with each death he'll become stronger, until he's able to topple Surtr and tip the balance away from the edge of ragnarok.

___________________________________________________
Contributors:
HelperWesley, As Game Designer
LightSpeed6, As Music And Sound Designer
CutOut2.0, As Story Director

Assets used:
https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
https://clockworkraven.itch.io/free-rpg-icon-pack-100-accessories-and-armor-clockwork-raven-studios
https://0x72.itch.io/pixeldudesmaker

___________________________________________________
This game was made for VimJam2 and it was an attempt to recreate the game Hades by Supergiant Games.
